availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Barnett (Grant County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and carpenter)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Mary "Polly" Nicholson Barnett in Grant County, Kentucky, in April 1835. Father of James O. Barnett, William A. Barnett, Mary A. Barnett, Arrabel "Annie" Barnett, John W. Barnett, George Barnett, and Eliza V. Barnett. Cabinet maker in Grant County in 1850. Carpenter in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 347A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, Williamstown, p. 987.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film 000266220.
